title._content: Image taken from page 69 of 'Letter of Governor Peirpont, to His Excellency the President and the Honorable Congress of the United States, on the subject of abuse of military power in the command of General Butler in Virginia and North Carolina'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Letter of Governor Peirpont, to His Excellency the President and the Honorable Congress of the United States, on the subject of abuse of military power in the command of General Butler in Virginia and North Carolina" Author: PIERPONT, Francis Harrison.
